com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise

Class SunriseDeviceSafety

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.SunriseSafetyStateProvider<DeviceSafetyState>
      • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.SunriseDeviceSafety
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDeviceSafety, ISafetyStateProvider<DeviceSafetyState>

    public class SunriseDeviceSafety
extends SunriseSafetyStateProvider<DeviceSafetyState>
implements IDeviceSafety
    This class provides a device specific safety state.

      • setSafetyWorkpiece

        public void setSafetyWorkpiece(com.kuka.geometry.PhysicalObject wp)
        Description copied from interface: IDeviceSafety
        Sets the workpiece load data used by safety monitoring functions.

        Accepted value ranges after rounding:

        • Mass: [0.001kg; 2000kg]
        • Center of Mass translation coordinates: [-10000mm; 10000mm]
        • Center of Mass rotation coordinates: [0°; 359°] (or radian equivalent)
        • Inertia per axis: [0kg*m^2; 1000kg*m^2]
        The value of the mass should be also lower than, or equal to the highest workpiece mass, that is configured under Project/Properties/Sunrise/Safety.

        Please note that this mechanism will be changed in future releases.

        Specified by:
        setSafetyWorkpiece in interface IDeviceSafety
        Parameters:
        wp - The physical object representing the workpiece that should be selected and containing its load data. Pass null to deselect.
